description.value:
Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Or Poison

Aura 5

Any enemy that starts its turn within the aura takes 20 damage of one of the following types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The annihilator chooses which type at the start of its turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+36 vs AC; (+37 while bloodied)3d10+10 damage.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+34 vs ; 3d8+10 damage.. the annihilator makes two greatsword attacks, each against a different target.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy attacks the annihilator with a melee attack

The annihilator attacks the triggering enemy; +36 vs AC; (+37 while bloodied)3d10+10 damage, and the target is pushed 5 squares and knocked prone.

Encounter ✦ Fire, Zone

Standard

Close blast 5

Sustain Minor

+32 vs Reflex; (+33 while bloodied)4d10+9 fire damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends). The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the annihilator's next turn (sustain minor). Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the zone takes 10 fire damage.

Encounter ✦ Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison

Free

Close burst 6

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Targets enemies; +34 vs Reflex; (+35 while bloodied)4d10+6 damage of one of the following types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Weapon

Standard

Close burst 1; +34 vs Reflex; (+35 while bloodied)2d10+10 damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Encounter

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When an enemy attacks the annihilator

The annihilator gains resist 30 to one of the following damage types until the end of the encounter: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.
A dragonborn gains a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls while bloodied.
The annihilator deals 2d10 extra damage with melee attacks against a prone target.

AC 49Fort 44Ref 44Will 45
Speed 7, fly 10 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 31 (+24)

Cha 32 (+25)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills History +24, Insight +28, Intimidate +32, Religion +27Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 33 | Insight 38

Equipment greatsword , plate armor .
